short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Level AI screen recorder companion extension that works alongside the Level AI Screen recorder app

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab recorder is an extension that will allow you to take screenshots periodically and lets you review it later. You just have to open the extension on the page  and click on "start recording". 

Then find all your backups ready to use whether you are a student, a scholar or a commercial representative, this extension is the key to saving enormous time!
In one click save all the important pages and urls for your productivity or the growth of your business.

It's Free and will always be !
